name: PacMan 3D (OxbowGameDev)
description:
I RECOMMEND TO DOWNLOAD BECAUSE THE WEB VERSION IS REALLY LAGGY. This is a PacMan game but 3D. Originally intended to submit in the Finally Finish Something 2021 game jam. WARNING: LOOK AT THE MINIMAP ALWAYS TO CHECK IF THERE ARE GHOST. ALWAYS WATCH YOUR BACK. THEY ARE SILENT. 

BUT YOU ARE SPECIAL. YOU HAVE ONLY ONE ABILITY I GAVE YOU. THAT IS YOU CAN JUMP OVER WALLS AND THEY CAN'T LOL. COLLECT ALL THOSE GOLDEN BALLS AND YOU WIN. COLLECT ALL OF THEM  BEFORE YOU ARE THERE FEAST.

KEYS~

WASD MOVEMENT

SHIFT TO RUN

SPACE TO JUMP

PLS DONATE

YOUTUBE CHANNEL - NERDSKLUB

PLEASE RATE 1 STAR.

THANKS, NABEEL
